projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on buying cookies from a cookie store

projects.title: Aperture Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images for a photography agency to attract customers to connect with photographers and book shootings:)

projects.title: ODD DUCK
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working at Codefellows. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows random pictures that lets users vote on pic by clicking it rendering a new set of pics after every vote. After 25 votes a tabled is rendered with the total votes
